00021 #ifndef MCCABEVISITOR_H
00022 #define MCCABEVISITOR_H
00023 
00028 #include "Visitor.h"
00029 
00035 class McCabeVisitor : public Visitor
00036 {
00037   public:
00038      McCabeVisitor() : decisionCount(0) { }
00040      void reInit() { decisionCount=0; }
00042      int getMcCabe() { return decisionCount; }
00043 
00044      void visitUnion(RightPart *rp1, RightPart *rp2) 
00045        { decisionCount++; rp1->accept(this); rp2->accept(this); }
00046      void visitConcat(RightPart *rp1, RightPart *rp2) 
00047        { rp1->accept(this); rp2->accept(this); }
00048      void visitKleeneClosure(RightPart *rp) 
00049        { decisionCount++; rp->accept(this); }
00050      void visitPositiveClosure(RightPart *rp) 
00051        { decisionCount++; rp->accept(this); }
00052      void visitOption(RightPart *rp) 
00053        { decisionCount++; rp->accept(this); }
00054      void visitTerminal(Terminal *) { ; }
00055      void visitNonTerminal(NonTerminal *nterm) { ; }
00056      void visitEmpty() { ; }
00057 
00058  private:
00060     int decisionCount;
00061 
00062 };
